about_the_game:
"Kadin the Soul Eater" is a gripping, branching story-driven RPG where players delve into the struggles of Kadin, a soul eater tormented by his own nature.

As Kadin grapples with his identity and yearns to be normal , players must navigate intricate choices that shape his fate. With three loyal friends by his side, Kadin seeks solace and support, yet a sinister shadow entity constantly tests his resolve. Meanwhile, the town faces a dire threat from the invading Krinklers, vicious creatures from the Land of Krink. Join Kadin and his companions on a perilous journey to confront both inner demons and external foes, unraveling mysteries and forging their destinies in a world teetering on the brink of chaos.

content_descriptors.notes: This game implies sexual activity, but is never shown. There are sexual innuendos, but nothing too graphic.  There are discussions of suicide, and light depictions of blood.

Join Kadin and his companions on a perilous journey to confront both inner demons and external foes, unraveling mysteries and forging their destinies in a world teetering on the brink of chaos.
name: Kadin the Soul Eater

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

short_description: A Story driven game, where choices can branch. Pretend to be a mortal with so called friends.
